text:
Symplicity | DC Metro (Arlington/Clarendon VA) | Front-end and Full Stack (Javascript/PHP) Engineers. We are building software to power the future of the workforce. Students use our flagships to find their first job, Universities use our product to increase employability outcomes and employers use it to find talent. We are growing (quickly!)
